scripts.test:infra:remote:staging: source .env && sshpass -p "$STAGING_PASSWORD" scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no infra/scripts/validate-infrastructure.sh root@$STAGING_HOST:/tmp/ && sshpass -p "$STAGING_PASSWORD" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$STAGING_HOST 'chmod +x /tmp/validate-infrastructure.sh && /tmp/validate-infrastructure.sh staging'
scripts.test:infra:remote:production: source .env && sshpass -p "$PRODUCTION_PASSWORD" scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no infra/scripts/validate-infrastructure.sh root@$PRODUCTION_HOST:/tmp/ && sshpass -p "$PRODUCTION_PASSWORD" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$PRODUCTION_HOST 'chmod +x /tmp/validate-infrastructure.sh && /tmp/validate-infrastructure.sh production'
